objenome.solver.evolve

Class FitnessEvaluator<I extends Organism>

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.solver.evolve.ProxyComponent<FitnessFunction>
      • objenome.solver.evolve.FitnessEvaluator<I>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener<ConfigEvent>, GPContainer.GPContainerAware, PopulationProcess<I>

    public class FitnessEvaluator<I extends Organism>
extends ProxyComponent<FitnessFunction>
implements PopulationProcess<I>
    Implementations of FitnessEvaluator are components that are responsible for assigning fitnesses to individuals in a population. Typically this will be performed by evaluating the quality of each individual against problem specific requirements.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static GPContainer.GPKey<FitnessFunction> FUNCTION
